hero.headline: A Multi-User Mobile Ecosystem for Solar Operations
hero.subtitle: SunPower needed to transform solar O&M capabilities with a comprehensive digital platform serving technicians in the field, managers monitoring portfolios, and customers tracking investments.

challenge.heading: The Challenge
challenge.intro: SunPower needed to transform their solar operations and maintenance capabilities with a comprehensive digital platform. The challenge: create a multi-user mobile ecosystem that serves technicians in the field, managers monitoring portfolios, and customers tracking their solar investments.

cards.title: Multi-User Complexity
cards.description: Three distinct user types — field technicians, operations managers, and end customers — each with fundamentally different needs, contexts, and technical literacy.

cards.title: Field Conditions
cards.description: Technicians work on rooftops and in the field, often with connectivity challenges. Mobile-first design was non-negotiable.

cards.title: Real-Time Data
cards.description: IoT sensor networks, weather data, and predictive maintenance algorithms all needed to feed into a coherent user experience.

approach.heading: Our Approach
approach.intro: We designed from the field up — starting with technician workflows, then building management and customer layers on the same data foundation.

steps.title: Field Research
steps.description: On-site observation with technicians during installations and maintenance. Understanding the physical realities of rooftop work.

steps.title: Platform Architecture
steps.description: Designing a unified data layer that serves three distinct interface paradigms — mobile for techs, dashboard for managers, portal for customers.

steps.title: IoT Integration
steps.description: Connecting sensor networks, weather APIs, and predictive maintenance models into actionable interface elements.

steps.title: Iterative Testing
steps.description: Usability testing with all three user groups to validate that each interface served its audience effectively.

work.heading: The Work
work.intro: We designed and delivered a complete multi-platform ecosystem spanning field operations, portfolio management, and customer engagement.

cards.title: Technician Mobile App
cards.description: Field-first mobile application for installation and maintenance workflows. Offline-capable, designed for outdoor use.

cards.title: Operations Dashboard
cards.description: Portfolio-wide monitoring and management interface. Real-time performance analytics and work order management.

cards.title: Customer Portal
cards.description: Customer-facing monitoring interface showing solar investment performance, savings, and system health.

cards.title: Predictive Maintenance
cards.description: Integration of predictive algorithms to optimize maintenance schedules and reduce unnecessary truck rolls.

results.heading: Results
results.intro: A unified platform that reduced operational friction across all three user types while improving maintenance efficiency.

metrics.label: Truck Rolls
metrics.description: Remote diagnostics and predictive maintenance reduced unnecessary site visits.

metrics.label: Issue Resolution
metrics.description: Mobile-first field workflows accelerated time from diagnosis to fix.

metrics.label: Customer Satisfaction
metrics.description: Transparency and real-time monitoring improved customer trust and engagement.

metrics.label: Maintenance Schedules
metrics.description: Predictive data insights enabled proactive rather than reactive maintenance.
